components.text: After the pumpcell has been cleaned (Ref to SOP-6.10.0) and see over, inspect following the list below.
P.S. If measurements are between 1.1 mm & 1.2 mm, a WN is require to rebuilt the screen next time the pumpcell is available (usually 17 days)
P.S. If at least 2 measurements are 1.2 mm or greater, the screen need to be change immediately
